      • createQuiz

        public void createQuiz(Quiz quiz)
                throws CreateFailedException

        Creates a Quiz in the database

        If a problem occurs throws a CreateFailedException

        usage example : QuizJDBCDAO quizdao = new... try{ quizdao.createQuestion ( QuizInstance)}; catch (CreateFailed e)
        Parameters:
        quiz - that quiz that is created
        Throws:
        CreateFailedException - The exception that is thrown when the quiz is not created

      • updateQuiz

        public void updateQuiz(Quiz quiz)
                throws UpdateFailedException

        Updates a Quiz

        If a problem occurs throws the UpdateFailedException

        usage example : QuizJDBCDAO quizdao = new .. try { quizdao.updateQuiz(QuizInstance);} catch ( UpdateFailed e )
        Parameters:
        quiz - The quiz that is updated ( new title and the id of the quiz to be updated )
        Throws:
        UpdateFailedException - The exception that is thrown when the quiz is not updated

        Gets the list of quizzes

        Returns:
        quizlist returns a list of quizzes
        Throws:

      • deleteQuiz

        public void deleteQuiz(Quiz quiz)
                throws DeleteFailedException

        Deletes a quiz

        If a problem occurs throws the DeleteFailedException

        usage example : QuizJDBCDAO quizdao = new .. try{ quiz.deleteQuiz(QuizInstance);} catch (ReadFailed e)
        Parameters:
        quiz - The quiz that is deleted
        Throws:
        DeleteFailedException - The exception that is thrown when the quiz is not deleted
